**What item do you want added?**
A clear description of what you want added. And why.


**Fill this in**
```json
{
    "Item_Name": "Little Yoko Doll",
    "Amount_Per_Bought_Item": 1,
    "Item_Description": "A little Yoko doll of Nakano.",
    "Price_In_yen": 750
}
```
